name: Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes 2 - Collector's Edition
name_original: Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes 2 - Collector's Edition
description:
Take a break from the holiday hubbub, and lose yourself in the snowy serenity of Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes 2. Play more than 1000 frosty levels and clear the icy tableaus. Unlock classic and new solitaire variants such as Genghis Khan, Lullaby, or Mammoth! Escape to a picturesque winter wonderland with enchanting backgrounds that change as you build fantasy locations throughout the game. From a cozy cottage to a snow-covered palace, every scene is a visual delight.

Embark on festive quests, collecting exclusive winter decorations to bring frozen scenes alive and enhance their beauty. Select game-changing power-ups across four unique game modes: Standard, Challenging, Relaxed, and Timed. No matter your preferred playstyle, prepare to be enchanted by a soothing holiday soundtrack, captivating winter visuals, and a mesmerizing gaming experience.

Don't miss out on the most delightful Solitaire experience of the year. Let the snowflakes guide your cards to victory with Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes 2!

- More than 1000 levels!
- 6 classical Solitaire games including Klondike, Spider and Freecell.
- 18 additional Solitaire variants including Somerset and Council.
- 120 replayable bonus Mahjong levels!
- 10 snowy fantasy locations to build.
- Play 4 different game modes: Normal, Hard, Relaxed and Timed.
- Play supersize, challenge, sliding and match-2 bonus level.
- Accomplish quests.
- Choose between multiple card decks to play with.
- Unlock stunning wallpapers for your desktop.
- Relish a soothing festive soundtrack.
